Pre-Game Insights: Cleveland finished 48-34 overall, 11-5 in Central Division play and 26-15 at home last season.
The Cavaliers averaged 16.6 points off of turnovers, 13.6 second-chance points and 34.4 bench points last season.
Milwaukee finished 49-33 overall and 34-18 in Eastern Conference games during the 2023-24 season.
The Bucks averaged 119.0 points per game last season, 47.1 in the paint, 14.5 off of turnovers and 12.7 on fast breaks.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cleveland and Milwaukee face off as Eastern Conference foes.
The Cavaliers are 7-0, first in the Eastern Conference, while the Bucks are 1-5, 14th in the Eastern Conference.
The Cavaliers have several injured players, including Caris LeVert, Emoni Bates, and Max Strus.
The Bucks also have an injured player, Khris Middleton.
Others: The game is scheduled for Monday, 7 p.m. EST, at Cleveland.
